definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: 2354 – An accident in one of the artificial Sun leads to drought.
sentences.chinese: 2354年，人造太陽出現事故，導致乾旱。

sentences.english: It had brought nothing but drought and famine.
sentences.chinese: 除了乾旱和飢餓，它無法帶來任何東西。

sentences.english: Droughts and forest fires are expected to increase due to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣候變化，預計將會出現更多的乾旱和林火。

sentences.english: Drought-induced proteins are produced in plants on response to drought stress.
sentences.chinese: 植物在乾旱環境下會產生乾旱誘導蛋白。

sentences.english: Drought-induced proteins are produced in plants on response to drought stress.
sentences.chinese: 植物在乾旱環境下會產生乾旱誘導蛋白。

sentences.english: And what should countries do to prepare for more intense droughts and storms?
sentences.chinese: 國家應該怎樣爲應對更嚴峻的乾旱和風暴做好準備？

sentences.english: Population density in arid areas is too high and damages the land further.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱地區的人口密度太高，這會進一步破壞土地。

sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱給通過湖南省湘江河的船隻帶來嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: The drought has hit eight provinces that produce much of China’s wheat.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱已經打擊了作爲中國小麥主產區的8個省份。

sentences.english: Drought has affected the flow of water into the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱影響了水向水庫的流動。

sentences.english: The mountain appreared barren, as though it had suffered through many years of arid climate.
sentences.chinese: 這座山看起來光禿禿的，似乎飽受了常年的乾旱天氣。

sentences.english: Irrigation is needed to make crops grow in dry regions.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱地區需要灌溉才能使作物生長。

sentences.english: Keshan Farm is one of drought farms in northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 克山農場是我國東北部比較乾旱的農場之一。

sentences.english: The drought also posed a threat to the immediate future of thousands of smallholder farmers.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱還威脅着成千上萬小農近期的生計。

sentences.english: Core samples revealed that it was desert-like only 400 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 岩心樣品顯示，在400年前，該島像沙漠一樣乾旱。

sentences.english: At the same time, it caused drought in East Africa.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，它造成了東非地區的乾旱。

definition: lit. men's footprints are rare (idiom)/fig. off the beaten track/lonely/deserted
